start.heading: The Regime
start.subheading: an analysis into the concept of creative democracy
start.quote: "It's not really a protest until someone shows up with a sharp glinting pitchfork." - Unknown

end.heading: Thank you for playing.
end.subheading: Democracy isn't just the tyranny of the majority, but the rule of true philosophy.
end.quote:
"More dialogue, less pitchforks."
